item.description: Come back to the Hoerman’s in the evening for a campfire. Bring your own food for the grill or the campfire. Don’t forget the marshmallows! For those who would like to spend the night and start fishing at the crack of dawn, there is plenty of room to pitch a tent in the “deer right of way,” with the added benefit of indoor plumbing being available. Be sure to bring your own grub for breakfast. If anyone does catch a good fish, Don even has the cast iron skillet to throw it on the campfire. Don will work out the details with those who RSVP
item.name: Campfire and more fishing
